Abilitydex

Voyager New Abilities
Voyager Updated Abilities
Voyager Negative Abilities
Name Cost Description
Aerodynamic 48 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Blustery Winds.
Arcane Armor 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Psychic Terrain.
Arena Lock 11 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
Bare Hands 48 Boosts the base power of the Pokémon's attacks if they are not holding an item.
Bland Bulwark 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Bland Terrain.
Butterfingers -3 The Pokémon may drop its held item when hit by a damaging move.
Calcifate 68 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Calderize 77 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Carbonize 77 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cecity -20 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Chlorolize 77 Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cognizate 77 Normal-type moves become Psychic-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cold-Blooded 32 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Combat Surge 84 Turns the ground into Combat Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Combatize 77 Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Convection 46 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it's hit by an attack.
Distillize 77 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Drowsy Aura 31 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
Enchantress 77 The Pokémon creates a bizarre area that negates hold items when it enters battle.
Flawed Form -17 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Floral Surge 84 Turns the ground into Floral Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Flower Fuzz 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Floral Terrain.
Fog Veil 11 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in eerie fog.
Fog Warning 102 The Pokémon creates an eerie fog upon entering battle.
Forecast 31 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the weather.
Frost Boost 68 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is frostbitten.
Frostproof 12 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Frozen Body 31 Contact with the Pokémon may cause frostbite.
Fumigate 77 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Ghastly Guard 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Eerie Fog.
Grayscale 84 Turns the ground into Bland Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Greenhouse 46 The Pokémon generates strong sunlight when it's hit by an attack.
Gunk Guard 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Noxious Terrain.
Heavy Water 4 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Rain.
High Entropy 31 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
Hive Mind 77 Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Immoralize 77 Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Imperious -92 This Pokémon sometimes refuses to obey its Trainer.
Indigestion 32 The Pokémon summons Noxious Terrain when it's hit by an attack.
Inflexible -28 This Pokémon can only use the first move it uses in battle.
Infuse Agility 82 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Infuse Armor 67 Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Infuse Prowess 82 Boosts the Pokémon's Special Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Infuse Strength 82 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Infuse Wards 67 Boosts the Pokémon's Special Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Irradiated 67 The Pokémon generates a solar wind when it's hit by an attack.
Jump Scare 68 The Pokémon moves first on the first turn of battle.
Lifelink 11 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Lithe Form 67 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Combat Terrain.
Menace 57 The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entry, lowering their Sp. Atk stat.
Misty Mane 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Misty Terrain.
Morbid Mania 33 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Morbid Terrain.
Morbid Surge 84 Turns the ground into Morbid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Noxious Surge 84 Turns the ground into Noxious Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Obliviate 31 Contact with the Pokémon may confuses the attacker.
Phantasmic 31 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Defense stats when it enters battle.
Photon Rush 67 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in solar wind.
Power Spore 31 Amplifies the effects of all primary statuses on the field.
Predictable -15 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Pressure System 102 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it enters battle.
Primal Prancer 56 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Primal Terrain.
Primal Surge 84 Turns the ground into Primal Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Primalize 77 Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Reality Rush 67 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Inverse Terrain.
Refraction 32 Boosts the power and effect likelihood of Beam-type moves.
Relativist 254 The Pokémon creates a bizarre area that inverts Speed when it enters battle.
Resonance 57 Boosts the damage given and received from sound-based moves.
Short Circuit 41 The Pokémon generates Electric Terrain when it's hit by an attack.
Shrapnel Surge 84 Turns the ground into Shrapnel Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Singularity 83 The Pokémon aplifies the Gravitational field when it enters battle.
Sleet Spit 46 The Pokémon generates a hailstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Sludge Rush 38 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Noxious Terrain.
Solar Aura 176 The Pokémon gains Electric-type and summons Electric Terrain in battle.
Solar Being 83 The Pokémon gains Fire-type and summons harsh sunlight when it enters battle.
Solar Burst 176 The Pokémon generates solar wind upon entering battle.
Sprinkle Spit 46 The Pokémon makes it rain when it's hit by an attack.
Steel Skin 9 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Shrapnel Terrain.
Tectonic Armor 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Tectonic Terrain.
Tectonic Surge 84 Turns the ground into Tectonic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Terralate 77 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Terrorize 77 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Unearthly 254 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Attack stats when it enters battle.
Unstable Isotope 31 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats under Gravity.
Volatile 67 Boosts the Special Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Warp Reality 84 Turns the ground into Inverse Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Weak Bones -1 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
Wispy Form 31 The Pokémon creates a eerie fog when it's hit by an attack.
